edge_1: Bruttenholm raised Hellboy instead of killing him when he came into the human world as a result of Project Ragna Rok by the Nazis.
edge_2: Hellboy accidentally kills transformed vampire Esteban Ruiz during a wrestling match in present-day Tijuana, Mexico.

edge_1: Bruttenholm raised Hellboy instead of killing him when he came into the human world as a result of Project Ragna Rok by the Nazis.
edge_2: Hellboy is assigned by B.P.R.D. leader Trevor Bruttenholm to assist the Osiris Club in hunting three giants in Great Britain.

edge_1: Bruttenholm raised Hellboy instead of killing him when he came into the human world as a result of Project Ragna Rok by the Nazis.
edge_2: Hellboy attempts to stop Nimue, but is overwhelmed as she poisons Alice and flees.

edge_1: Alice Monaghan, a medium rescued by Hellboy as a baby, recognizes him when he collapses in her flat after being betrayed and nearly killed by the hunters during the hunt for three giants.
